# Build your iOS Wallet

In this section, you will find all the resources needed to build your own iOS Wallet application using the tools and libraries provided by the EUDI Wallet Reference Implementation.

Let's start with your implementation!

| Description | Get Started |
| --- |--- |
| Reference Implementation Wallet Application |[iOS Wallet](./wallet-application-level/index.md) |
| Reference Implementation Core |[iOS Core](./library-level/index.md) |
